text: Monkey Business is a 1952 American comedy movie directed by Howard Hawks and starring Cary Grant, Ginger Rogers, Marilyn Monroe, Hugh Marlowe, Esther Dale, Charles Coburn. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1952 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: Monkey Business (1952 movie)
